column4: a problem .... the last version of pastebinit does not seem to work anymore .... if you do "pastebinit -i filename.txt" it does not return a pastebin link, but just the url to the front page of the website .... what is going on?
its been broke for a few weeks now.
the web site changed stuff it seems
thanks a lot .... yes, it has been broken for quite a while for me as well .... I though it was a temporary problem
